title: Significant effects of negligible amount of H2O2 on photocatalytic efficiency of MIL-125 and NH2-MIL-125 nanostructures in degradation of methylene blue
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30140-30153
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05733C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Afsaneh Mahmoodi, Davoud Dorranian, Hamed Abbasi
The notable impact of a trace amount of hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) on the photocatalytic performance of Ti-based metal–organic frameworks (MOFs), in the purification of water polluted with chemical agents was studied experimentally.
